scenarios.name: Worker crash during inference
scenarios.description: Kill worker process while processing request
scenarios.expected_behavior: Request should be retried on another worker or fail gracefully

scenarios.name: Worker crash during registration
scenarios.expected_behavior: Registration should timeout and worker should be marked as failed

scenarios.name: Worker OOM kill
scenarios.expected_behavior: Hive should detect worker death and remove from pool

scenarios.name: Worker graceful shutdown timeout
scenarios.description: Worker doesn't respond to SIGTERM within timeout
scenarios.expected_behavior: Hive should force-kill worker after timeout

scenarios.name: Multiple worker crashes
scenarios.expected_behavior: System should continue with remaining workers
